Package services

Interface PassengerService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PassengerServiceImpl

    public interface PassengerService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String[] buildPassengerWaypoints​(VehicleInterface vehicle, java.lang.String origin, java.lang.String destination)
      Builds a route based on the route between origin and destination -parameters and the current passengers, picking up passengers within 1500 meter-radius for each step in the route for the vehicle specified.
      PassengerInterface createPassenger​(java.lang.String origin, java.lang.String destination)
      Creates new passenger and returns the specifics of the passenger if successful.
      java.util.List<PassengerInterface> getAllPassengers​()
      Returns a list of the current existing PassengerInterface -objects.
      PassengerInterface getPassenger​(int passengerId)
      Returns a PassengerInterface -object detailing the specifics of the passenger.
      PassengerInterface moveToBusStop​(int passengerId, int stopId)
      The specified passenger is added to the bus-stop/station with a corresponding stopId.

    • Method Detail

      • buildPassengerWaypoints

        java.lang.String[] buildPassengerWaypoints​(VehicleInterface vehicle,
                                           java.lang.String origin,
                                           java.lang.String destination)
                                    throws com.google.maps.errors.ApiException,
                                           java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                           java.io.IOException
        Builds a route based on the route between origin and destination -parameters and the current passengers, picking up passengers within 1500 meter-radius for each step in the route for the vehicle specified. Does not include passengers in the route if bus cannot take more passengers.
        Parameters:
        passengerId - used to find a specific passenger
        Returns:
        returns a PassengerInterface -object detailing the specifics of the passenger
        Throws:
        com.google.maps.errors.ApiException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.io.IOException

      • getAllPassengers

        java.util.List<PassengerInterface> getAllPassengers​()
        Returns a list of the current existing PassengerInterface -objects.
        Returns:
        returns a list of the current PassengerInterface -objects.

      • getPassenger

        PassengerInterface getPassenger​(int passengerId)
        Returns a PassengerInterface -object detailing the specifics of the passenger.
        Parameters:
        passengerId - used to find a specific passenger
        Returns:
        returns a PassengerInterface -object detailing the specifics of the passenger

      • createPassenger

        PassengerInterface createPassenger​(java.lang.String origin,
                                   java.lang.String destination)
                            throws com.google.maps.errors.ApiException,
                                   java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                   java.io.IOException
        Creates new passenger and returns the specifics of the passenger if successful.
        Parameters:
        origin - is the starting location for the passenger
        destination - is the final destination for the passenger
        Returns:
        returns a PassengerInterface -object detailing the specifics of the created passenger
        Throws:
        com.google.maps.errors.ApiException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.io.IOException

      • moveToBusStop

        PassengerInterface moveToBusStop​(int passengerId,
                                 int stopId)
        The specified passenger is added to the bus-stop/station with a corresponding stopId. Returns a PassengerInterface -object detailing the specifics of the passenger.
        Parameters:
        passengerId - used to find a specific passenger
        stopId - used to find a specific stop
        Returns:
        returns a PassengerInterface -object detailing the specifics of the passenger.
